Directions: In a mixing bowl, combine dry cake mix, applesauce, water, oil, eggs, cinnamon, nutmeg and allspice.  Beat on medium speed for 2 minutes.  Stir in raisins.  Pour into two greased 8-in. x 4-in. x 2-in. loaf pans.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 45-50 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean.  Cool for 5-10 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.
